### Prerequisites
- Ruby 3.x
- Jekyll
- Bundler

### Local Development

```bash
# Install dependencies
bundle install

# Start local server
bundle exec jekyll serve

# View in browser
http://localhost:4000

# Stop server
Ctrl + C
